about_the_game:
Short FPS game.
This game is a free add-on to the base game.

How to play

You can select this game by pressing "Play" in the Steam app.

Features of this DLC game

The game is built using by GameGuru FPS engine.
I created this game for players who like games created by GameGuru.

Purpose of the game

The goal of the game is to collect five documents that exist on the field.
Documents are protected by enemies armed with guns.
Let's defeat the enemy and get the papers.

Controls

Move: W, A, S, D
Mouse wheel: Change weapons
Interact: E
Jump: Spacebar
Run: Shift key
Aim: Hold the right mouse button
Shoot: Left mouse click
Reload: R
Pause screen: ESC

content_descriptors.notes:
This game includes the expression of attacking enemy characters with the gun.
There is the expression of bloodshed.

name: I'm Strongest Legend - Guru Field 2022

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT, Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 824 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 824 MB available space

short_description: Short FPS game. This game is a free add-on to the base game.
